item.title: Hi ðŸ‘‹, I'm Ynki!
item.description:
Goal!
The main purpose of my presence is to remain anonymous.
The main is to create something new.

What I can?
Software & systems: core platforms, high-performance services.
Driver development: Windows/Linux kernel and device drivers, tooling.
Web engineering: lean backends, stable APIs, admin tooling, integrations.
Mobile: native iOS/Android or cross-platform only when it fits.

How work?
Direct interaction: single-message communication.
Short iterations: clear phases, demos, and measurable outcomes.
Simple architecture: testable designs, reproducible builds, and no redundancy.
Quality by default: built-in testing, code reviews, and observability.
